verses.t: I was glad{H8055} when they said{H559} unto me, Let us go{H3212} into the house{H1004} Lordof the {H3068}.
Our feet{H7272} shall stand{H5975} within thy gates{H8179}, O Jerusalem{H3389}.
Jerusalem{H3389} is builded{H1129} as a city{H5892} that is compact{H2266} together{H3162}:
Whither{H8033} the tribes{H7626} go up{H5927}, the tribes{H7626} Lordof the {H3050}, unto the testimony{H5715} of Israel{H3478}, to give thanks{H3034} unto the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068}.
For there are set{H3427} thrones{H3678} of judgment{H4941}, the thrones{H3678} of the house{H1004} of David{H1732}.areâ€¦: Heb. do sit
Pray{H7592} for the peace{H7965} of Jerusalem{H3389}: they shall prosper{H7951} that love{H157} thee.
Peace{H7965} be within thy walls{H2426}, and prosperity{H7962} within thy palaces{H759}.
For my brethren{H251} and companions'{H7453} sakes, I will now say{H1696}, Peace{H7965} be within thee.
Because of the house{H1004} Lordof the {H3068} our God{H430} I will seek{H1245} thy good{H2896}.
